description:
Midge and the others arrive at the entrance to a warp tunnel that leads to the solar system, but the gate won`t open! When they go to the control room to investigate, they find a small shrimp named Lancelot. In order to open the gate the gang heads to an asteroid called Izukawa with Lancelot. Izukawa was developed as a civilian vacation home and there the group encounters a service robot named Sebastian who they ask for help sending a signal. However, when there is no response to the signal, Lancelots true motives come to light.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blocked Space Highway / Villa at the End of the Universe
Fuusa Sareta Uchuu Highway / Uchuu no Hate no Bessou
封鎖された宇宙ハイウェイ / 宇宙の果ての別荘
